info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 19 at 1:24PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...SCATTERED HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS THROUGH 3 PM... In the wake of the line of snow squalls, another band of heavy snow showers was located along a line extending from near Lake George Village to near Saratoga Springs to Delanson. Movement was east at 40 mph. Locations impacted include... Schenectady, Clifton Park, Rotterdam, Saratoga Springs, Cohoes, Glens Falls, Colonie, Scotia, Hudson Falls, Mechanicville, Cobleskill, Whitehall, Salem, Lake George Village, Glenville, Niskayuna, Duanesburg, Ballston Spa, Fort Edward and Granville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 88 between exits 21 and 25. Interstate 90 between exits 25 and 26. Interstate 890 between exits 1a and 9. Interstate 87 between exits 5 and 7, and between exits 8A and 21. An additional half inch of snow is possible as these heavy snow showers pass through. Be prepared for hazardous driving conditions. Consider delaying travel if you will be going through these heavy snow showers. Visibilities may be briefly below one quarter of a mile within these heavy snow showers. If you are driving, slow down and be on alert for other motorists. Low visibility shortens the amount of time you have to react to situations. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
